newsitem.title: USA: FTP Software says sees Q4 operating loss.
newsitem.headline: FTP Software says sees Q4 operating loss.

text.p: FTP Software Inc said on Tuesday it expected to incur a loss of $5 to $7 million in the fourth quarter of 1996.
The company said its revenues from continuing operations in the fourth quarter of 1996 were anticipated to be in a range of $22 to $24 million.
Looking forward to 1997, FTP said it saw revenues growing in the range of 25 to 30 percent over 1996.
It said it currently expected to incur operating losses during the first half of 1997 as the VIP Network product plan was implemented, with operating profits realised thereafter.
FTP unveiled its plan for the Virtual IP, or VIP Network, a set of software solutions to manage Internet protocol infrastructures.
